lead_paragraph: Two schools and a hospital, linked to the Muslim cleric whom the Turkish president blames for an attempted coup, were closed.

headline.print_headline: In Debt to Turkey, Somalia Shuts Network Tied to Muslim Cleric
headline.main: In Debt to Turkey, Somalia Shuts Network Tied to Fethullah Gulen
